Articles.Content: Hi, I have tried installing some mods in ksp latest version [ planet packs ] It seemed to work fine, but when I installed some part mods, the program just crashed. It seems like the program just uses up to much space. Is there a better solution, like a older ksp version that doesn't take much power, and plenty of space for many planet packs as well as part mods.

Moved to tech support modded.

 

When you say too much space, what do you mean?   How much do you have?   How much is it using?     What’s your log file?
I got about plenty of space in my pc, like about 351 GB, but the program just takes to much power to opperate, Is there something that can fix this?
